item.title: Milestones/Roadmap
item.description: Write project’s milestones (~15 February 2021) Style and structure of the Sv2 repo decided and documented (~15 February 2021) Create github organization (~15 February 2021) Create github page with blog and track record for Sv2 (~1 March 2021) Create style.md contribute.md and architecture.md (~1 March 2021) (everything in readme for now) Publish version 0.1.0 of Sv2 noise authentication on crates.io (~15 April 2021) Publish version 0.1.0 of Template Distribution Protocol on crates.
